---
title: "md vs rmd vs qmd"
format: html
---

## Markdown

Simple language to **quickly** format documents _but_ can't run code

```
3 + 4
```

## Rmarkdown

Markdown + ability to run code written in R

```{r}
3 + 4
```


## Quarto

RMarkdown + ability to code written in R, Python, Javascript, and Julia + more features

```{{python}}
print(3)
```
